messages.title: Let’s get Britain on the road to recovery
messages.content: Our economy is in a fragile state. One wrong move could send Britain tumbling back into recession. Now more than ever our country needs the right policies to get the economy moving again.

issues.economy: Our economy is in a fragile state. One wrong move could send Britain tumbling back into recession. Now more than ever our country needs the right policies to get the economy moving again.
issues.governance: Only Nick Clegg’s Liberal Democrats are offering a different approach.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want to make sure your voice is heard. That’s why I have enclosed a form to allow you to vote by post at the election. Voting by post is quick, easy and guarantees that your vote will count.

politicalExperience.role: Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer for the Liberal Democrats

images.caption: change that works for you building a fairer Britain

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - Make sure your voice is heard by signing up for a postal vote today using the form enclosed. Your vote could be the one that brings real change to Britain.
